Smuggler.synopsis: A smuggler watches you approach and wants you to leave.Player can convince smuggler to sell the goods, or player initiates combat.

Guard_002.synopsis: Smuggler Guard 002 does not like being spoken to

Guard_001.synopsis: Smuggler Guard 001 simply makes noises when spoken to.

Guard_003.synopsis: Smuggler Guard 003 is a bit weird

Smuggler_15.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_15.text: Mate, what part of 'Guild business' isn't getting through that stone-skull of yours?

Smuggler_22.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_22.text: We doing this or not? The Guild ain't my only clients, you know. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Smuggler_22.context: NodeContext: annoyed but trying not to show it

Smuggler_32.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_32.text: Best not hang around - the Fist have their hands full, but that doesn't mean a patrol won't come sniffing.

Smuggler_41.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_41.text: The Guild will kill us for this - if we're lucky. I hope you're bloody happy.

Smuggler_49.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_49.text: Whoa, whoa, mate - this is the last place you need to be. Clear off, yeah?
Smuggler_49.context: NodeContext: hands out as if to block the player from going any further, trying to make the player leave as quickly as possible (that kind of faux friendly but forceful tone of a bouncer)

Smuggler_11.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_11.text: Two words - Guild business. Only an idiot gets between them and their shipments.
Smuggler_11.context: NodeContext: thinks player is a dumbass

Smuggler_38.speaker: Player
Smuggler_38.text: I'm actually with the Guild - I'm here to pick up that shipment.

Smuggler_44.speaker: Player
Smuggler_44.text: I'm actually with the Guild - I'm here to pick up that shipment.

Smuggler_25.speaker: Player
Smuggler_25.text: You didn't hear? I'm the new Guild representative. I've been dying to get my hands on that shipment.

Smuggler_1.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_1.text: Oh! Why didn't you lead with that? I trust you're gonna balance the books too, yeah? ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
Smuggler_1.context: NodeContext: suddenly much more deferential, eager

Smuggler_42.speaker: Player
Smuggler_42.text: Depends. You got everything we ordered?

Smuggler_29.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_29.text: Oh yeah. Weapons, drugs, bitta firewine, you know - the usuals.
Smuggler_29.context: NodeContext: vaguely gestures around him with a shrug

Smuggler_24.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_24.text: Pleasure as always. Better clear it out before the Fist get here - you know how they are.

Smuggler_48.speaker: Player
Smuggler_48.text: My pockets seem to be running a little empty.

Smuggler_13.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_13.text: Funny thing - so is my patience. No gold, no goods.

Smuggler_46.speaker: Player
Smuggler_46.text: I think I'll just loot your corpses instead.

Smuggler_20.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_20.text: Cocky shit. I'm going to enjoy this.

Smuggler_28.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_28.text: I ain't got all day, mate.

Smuggler_30.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_30.text: You think I don't know a shakedown when I see one? Cocky shit. I'm going to enjoy this.

Smuggler_39.speaker: Player
Smuggler_39.text: Hand over that shipment, or the Guild will be the least of your problems.

Smuggler_9.speaker: Player
Smuggler_9.text: Hand over that shipment, or I'll start breaking bones.

Smuggler_47.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_47.text: Easy, mate. We're humble smugglers, all right? So just - just take whatever you want.
Smuggler_47.context: NodeContext: nervous, player has decided to rob him. Gestures around him at the surrounding crates

Smuggler_3.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_3.text: Not enough that the Guild will have my head for this - you want to leave my little ones copperless too?

Smuggler_5.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_5.text: Gods damn it all - fine. Here - take it and go.
Smuggler_5.context: NodeContext: generic handing over motion. Disgusted

Smuggler_4.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_4.text: Shit. Shit. I - I've got nothing. I swear it. You've got everything, so just go - please.
Smuggler_4.context: NodeContext: frantically patting pockets at the beginning, then scared, hoping player will leave (they do)

Smuggler_14.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_14.text: Not enough to rob me, you're gonna take every copper I have, is it? I'd rather go down fighting.
Smuggler_14.context: NodeContext: furious, about to enter combat

Smuggler_26.speaker: Player
Smuggler_26.text: Turn out your pockets too. NOW.

Smuggler_10.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_10.text: So that the Guild can stick my head on a pike? Not a chance.
Smuggler_10.context: NodeContext: furious, about to start combat

Smuggler_27.speaker: Player
Smuggler_27.text: Give me that shipment or die. Choose.

Smuggler_16.speaker: Player
Smuggler_16.text: How about I just kill you and take everything?

Smuggler_36.speaker: Player
Smuggler_36.text: I'm looking to buy some fish.

Smuggler_0.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_0.text: You'll be swimming with the critters unless you skedaddle. The Guild are due to pick up this shipment at any moment.
Smuggler_0.context: NodeContext: thinks player is a dumbass

Smuggler_23.speaker: Player
Smuggler_23.text: You look busy. I'll leave you to it.

Smuggler_33.speaker: Big Huido
Smuggler_33.text: Best idea you've had all day, mate.

Guard_002_0.speaker: Lo Blank
Guard_002_0.text: Nice to meet a Guildy - put in a good word for me, yeah?

Guard_002_1.speaker: Lo Blank
Guard_002_1.text: Hey cutie - I'd suggest we hit the 'Maid, but a girl's gotta work. Maybe next time.

Guard_002_2.speaker: Lo Blank
Guard_002_2.text: You know the Guild will gut us for this? Bastard.

Guard_002_3.speaker: Lo Blank
Guard_002_3.text: Sorry cutie, I'm on the clock.

Guard_001_0.speaker: Galem Meats
Guard_001_0.context: NodeContext: noise of admiration, a kudos

Guard_001_1.speaker: Galem Meats
Guard_001_1.context: NodeContext: rolling eyes - has no time for player

Guard_001_2.speaker: Galem Meats
Guard_001_2.context: NodeContext: pissed off at player, angry

Guard_001_3.speaker: Galem Meats
Guard_001_3.context: NodeContext: looks player over, completey unimplressed

Guard_003_0.speaker: Jezzy Topps
Guard_003_0.text: New to the Guild, are you? If you're not dead in a tenday, I might learn your name.

Guard_003_1.speaker: Jezzy Topps
Guard_003_1.text: Huido is supposed to keep the idiots away. Far away.

Guard_003_2.speaker: Jezzy Topps
Guard_003_2.text: Kindly leave or jump in the sea - either works.

Guard_003_3.speaker: Jezzy Topps
Guard_003_3.text: Leave - before I decide killing you is worth the risk.
